Please confirm you have completed following steps:

  • Negotiations occur during this stage.
  • Prepare and send contract package.
  • Send credit application to prospect.
  • Review site readiness requirements with the prospect.
  • Arrange the site survey with Field Ops.
  • Communicate with Contract Desk and prospect to hand-off project.
  • Conduct check-ins with the prospect and handle business issues quickly if they arise.
  • Create for and submit a forecast seven weeks before delivery date.

Please confirm you have completed following steps:

  • Continue to conduct check-ins with the customer.

Please confirm you have completed following steps:

  • Schedule a meeting with the prospect to present the solution.
  • Present solution and proposal to the prospect.
  • Be on alert for and quickly respond to any inquiries from the prospect.
